definitions.definition: A person or thing that is to be deplored.
(US politics) A Trumpist conservative, in reference to a 2016 speech by Hillary Clinton calling half of Donald Trump's supporters a "basket of deplorables".
Deserving strong condemnation; shockingly bad, wretched.
definitions.example: Poor children are often accused of having deplorable manners, when they are, in fact, simply responding to society in ways that mirror how society treats them.

definitions.definition: Lamentable, to be felt sorrow for, worthy of compassion.
definitions.example: We were all saddened by the deplorable death of his son.
